TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CopyItemType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseMoveCopyItemType

Docs.summary: The class represents an operation to copy items in a mailbox.

remarks.para: The item identifier of the new item is returned in the response message (). Item identifiers are not returned in responses for a cross-mailbox or mailbox to public folder CopyItem operation.

example.para: The following code example copies two items to the Inbox.
